result.title: Life is full of ups and downs~
result.content: Hello, codeforces! In my first contest, I solved 4 problems and ranked 13 in div 2, hence getting a new rating of 1766! However, in my second contest, #292 div 1, I made some silly mistakes, such as using "int" when "long long" is needed and misunderstanding the meaning of the problem. <o.O> As for the simpler problems, I didn't try the greedy algo because I was not sure. As a result, I didn't solve any problem and has gone back to div 2... Anyway, it's the last day before the Chinese New Year and I hope I can make progress in the year of sheep, which means "luck" in Chinese!
